DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect exercise program nursing home patient dementia .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise Program Nursing Home Patients With Dementia
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention group exercise one hour twice week 12 week . The participant intensive strength exercise challenge balance exercise group 4-6 . Two physical therapist lead intervention group . The control group meeting frequency . Groups 4-6 lead occupational therapist . The participant relaxation exercise , listen music social activity board game indoor bowling . The investigator carry three test period : - Baseline test intervention start - Post test 12 week intervention - Follow-up 12 week post test . The test comprise : - Physical test carry physiotherapist - Questionnaires concern mental health ADL ( activity daily live ) - Cognition test - Cortisol saliva
DOC.criteria: > 55 year old Living nursing home Able stand help max 1 Able walk 6 meter without walk aid Medically unstable Longterm psychotic Severe communication problem
